name: Tomas Lawton

projects.title: Reframer
projects.description: Functional AI vector drawing platform using a modified CLIP algorithm.

projects.title: Autobeat
projects.description: Functional music sampler plugin for auto-generating beats using ML in Ableton.

projects.title: Bloom
projects.description: Music geo-streaming service that plays "the soundtrack to your life."

projects.title: Coah.io
projects.description: App design for well-being app for elderly people.

projects.title: Interactive Earth
projects.description: Functional interactive earth data visualization showing child mortality rates around the world and predicted into the future.

projects.title: Postie
projects.description: Mockup for a desktop application for automated contract signing.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I assist in the creation and development of state-of-the-art software applications using an array of new technologies.

services.title: Product Design
services.description: I explore and evaluate designs at incremental creative stages to achieve high-quality design outputs through iteration.

services.title: Research
services.description: I deploy deep critical consideration to the development and execution of research strategies and experiments.

services.title: Distribution
services.description: I collaborate with various experts and team members to take work from early stages to release for general availability consumption.

aboutpara: Highly creative software engineer with a proven ability to build state-of-the-art applications using an array of new technologies. With strong skills in both design and programming, I am driven to explore my options and put my assumptions to the test as I iteratively construct sophisticated research artefacts and deliver enterprise solutions to complex problems with ambiguity.
